title: Located in Kyle, Tx. Just a short drive south of Austin.
posting_body: Just a short drive south of Austin.
Kyle is a small, but quickly growing town.
The town offers a great mix of urban and small town feel, with plenty of restaurants, outdoor fun, and more.
At first glance of this lovely 3 bed 3 bath, you'd be forgiven for not spotting anything out of the ordinary.
Yet as soon as you climb its front step up on to the covered porch and head inside, you'll quickly change your mind.

This home was perfectly updated to have a modern feel and still keep its charm and character with modern neutral toned walls and wood grain floor and it’s vintage kitchen, vintage wood burning fireplace, and retro bathrooms.
In the kitchen you will find a stainless steel fridge, dishwasher, built oven, microwave and electric stove top.
There is also plenty of cabinet space, as well as a pantry.
This home has multiple living areas, including a living area with exposed beams, a brick accent wall and 2 ceiling fans.
Get creative and make this place your own!
All 3 bedrooms have ample closet space and ceiling fans.
Outside you’ll find plenty of front and backyard space with a fence enclosing your backyard and a charming little swing hanging off one of the large oak trees.
This is a unique one of a kind home for a great price, come see it today!
For more details or information call me : (833)-
